title: "Iancu Says Patent Apps Featuring AI Doubled Since 2002"
excerpt: "A forthcoming U.S. Patent and Trademark Office report will show that patent applications involving the use of artificial intelligence have skyrocketed, the agency's director said Thursday as part of a discussion that also delved into pandemic woes and the fate of the covered business method review program."
